name: yinOyang
publications: Prediction of glycosylation  sites  in proteomes:  from post-translational modifications to protein function.  R Gupta.  Ph.D. thesis at CBS, 2001.
Prediction of glycosylation across the human proteome  and the correlation to protein function.  Gupta, R. and S. Brunak.  Pacific Symposium on Biocomputing, 7:310-322, 2002.
description: produces neural network predictions for O-(beta)-GlcNAc attachment sites in eukaryotic protein sequences.
